languages.text: Будущему чемпиону Хаоса нужны последователи. Есть только один способ доказать слугам свое могущество — свершая дела против смертных и во имя Хаоса.
A future champion of Chaos needs followers. There is only one way to prove the Rogue Trader's might to {mf|his|her} servants — by committing acts against mortals and in the name of Chaos.
languages.original_text: Будущему чемпиону Хаоса нужны последователи. Есть только один способ доказать слугам свое могущество — свершая дела против смертных и во имя Хаоса.

traits.locale_text: A future champion of Chaos needs followers. There is only one way to prove your might to your servants — by committing acts against mortals and in the name of Chaos.
A future champion of Chaos needs followers. There is only one way to prove your might to your servants — by committing acts against mortals and in the name of Chaos.
A future champion of Chaos needs followers. There is only one way to prove your might to your servants — by committing acts against mortals and in the name of Chaos.
A future champion of Chaos needs followers. There is only one way to prove your might to your servants — by committing acts against mortals and in the name of Chaos.

languages.text: Ein zukünftiger Champion des Chaos braucht Gefolgsleute. Es gibt nur einen Weg, den Dienern die Macht {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu beweisen ... mit Schreckenstaten an Sterblichen im Namen des Chaos.
languages.original_text: A future champion of Chaos needs followers. There is only one way to prove the Rogue Trader's might to {mf|his|her} servants — by committing acts against mortals and in the name of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: Ein zukünftiger Champion des Chaos braucht Gefolgsleute. Es gibt nur einen Weg, den Dienern die Macht {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu beweisen ... mit Schreckenstaten an Sterblichen im Namen des Chaos.
Ein zukünftiger Champion des Chaos braucht Gefolgsleute. Es gibt nur einen Weg, Euren Dienern Eure Macht zu beweisen ... indem Ihr im Namen des Chaos Gräueltaten an Sterblichen begeht.

languages.text: {mf|Un futur champion|Une future championne} du Chaos a besoin de disciples. Or, il n'y a qu'un seul moyen de prouver la toute-puissance {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} à ses serviteurs : s'en prendre aux mortels au nom du Chaos.
languages.original_text: A future champion of Chaos needs followers. There is only one way to prove the Rogue Trader's might to {mf|his|her} servants — by committing acts against mortals and in the name of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Un futur champion|Une future championne} du Chaos a besoin de disciples. Or, il n'y a qu'un seul moyen de prouver la toute-puissance {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} à ses serviteurs : s'en prendre aux mortels au nom du Chaos.

languages.text: Un{mf||a} futur{mf|o|a} campe{mf|ón|ona} del Caos necesita seguidores. Solo hay una forma de demostrar el poder de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a sus sirvientes: actuando contra los mortales en nombre del Caos.
languages.original_text: A future champion of Chaos needs followers. There is only one way to prove the Rogue Trader's might to {mf|his|her} servants — by committing acts against mortals and in the name of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: Un{mf||a} futur{mf|o|a} campe{mf|ón|ona} del Caos necesita seguidores. Solo hay una forma de demostrar el poder de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente a sus sirvientes: actuando contra los mortales en nombre del Caos.

languages.text: 未来的混沌神选者需要追随者。只有一种方法能向行商浪人的仆人证明力量，那就是以混沌之名惩处凡人。
languages.original_text: A future champion of Chaos needs followers. There is only one way to prove the Rogue Trader's might to {mf|his|her} servants — by committing acts against mortals and in the name of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: 未来的混沌神选者需要追随者。只有一种方法能向行商浪人的仆人证明力量，那就是以混沌之名惩处凡人。
未来的混沌神选者需要追随者。只有一种方法能向你的仆人证明你的力量，那就是以混沌之名惩处凡人。

languages.text: 将来、渾沌を牛耳る者には取り巻きが必要だ。従者達に自由開拓者が己の力を証明する方法はただひとつ。渾沌の名において、人間に手をかけることだ。
languages.original_text: A future champion of Chaos needs followers. There is only one way to prove the Rogue Trader's might to {mf|his|her} servants — by committing acts against mortals and in the name of Chaos.

traits.locale_text: 将来、渾沌を牛耳る者には取り巻きが必要だ。従者達に自由開拓者が己の力を証明する方法はただひとつ。渾沌の名において、人間に手をかけることだ。
将来、渾沌を牛耳る者には取り巻きが必要だ。従者達に己の力を証明する方法はただひとつ、渾沌の名において、人間に手をかけるのだ。

languages.text: Geleceğin Kaos müdafisinin takipçilere ihtiyacı var. Hizmetkârlarına kudretini kanıtlamanın tek bir yolu var: Fânilere karşı Kaos adına faaliyetler gerçekleştirmek.
languages.original_text: A future champion of Chaos needs followers. There is only one way to prove the Rogue Trader's might to {mf|his|her} servants — by committing acts against mortals and in the name of Chaos.
